Package it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.servlet

package it.unipd.dei.webapp.wacar.servlet
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AbstractDatabaseServlet
    Gets the DataSource for managing the connection pool to the database.
    AdminServlet
    This servlet handles the operations of the admin.
    CreateFavouriteServlet
    Create a new favourite and pass to the recap-favourite.jsp page the object to be shown on it.
    DeleteFavouriteServlet
    Servlet for handling HTTP POST requests to delete a favorite from the user's list of favorites.
    DeleteOrderServlet
     
    HomeServlet
    HomeServlet class serves as the controller for the home page of the application.
    ListCarServlet
    Servlet implementation class ListCarServlet.
    ListCircuitServlet
    Servlet implementation class ListCircuitServlet Retrieves circuits from the database and passes them to a JSP page to display the list of circuits.
    ListFavouriteServlet
    Servlet for handling HTTP GET requests to list a user's favorites.
    ListOrdersByEmailServlet
    Servlet to handle the listing of the orders of a specific user.
    LoadCarImageServlet
    Servlet responsible for loading and serving the image of a car based on the provided brand and model.
    LoadCircuitImageServlet
    Servlet responsible for loading and serving the image of a circuit based on the provided name.
    OrderServlet
    Handle all the steps to create an order.
    RestDispatcherServlet
    Dispatches the request to the proper REST resource.
    UpdateAccountServlet
    Servlet for handling HTTP POST requests to update a user's account information.
    UpdateOrderServlet
    Servlet for handling HTTP GET and POST requests to update a user's order information.
    UserServlet
    Servlet for managing user-related operations.
